comments.content:
> There is no "common-build.xml" file there in the
> lucene-2.0.0.zip downloaded from site.

I believe this is expected, see below...

> I follow the steps given in Build.txt for the installation of

BUILD.txt does not contain instructions for installing lucene, it is instructions for building lucene from the source files – which ar not inlcuded in lucene-2.0.0.zip, that is a binary release containing only the jars, documentation, and demo code.

If you'd like to install lucene, just copy the jars somewhere you wish to use them – if you'd like to build lucene from source please download a source distribition.

(I'm not entirely sure why the build.xml and BUILD.txt files are in the binary distributions at all)
comments.author: Hoss Man
